Text: Re this is goodPST This is false Go to this website for more info libraryblnorthhtm Heres Ollies response to this email thats going around As you will note the originator attributes to me certain statements regarding Usama bin Laden and other matters that are simply inaccurate Though I would like to claim the gift of prophesy I dont have it Marc Stewart alliacom wrote WAIT TILL YOU READ THIS ONE ANYONE REMEMBER THIS IT WAS At a UNC lecture the other day they played an old video of Lt ColOliver North testifying at the IranContra hearings during the Reagan Administration There was Ollie in front of God and country getting the third degree But what he said was stunning He was being drilled by some senator Did you not recently spend close to for a home security system Ollie replied Yes I did sir The senator continued trying to get a laugh out of the audience Isnt this just a little excessive No sir continued Ollie No And why not the senator asked Because the lives of my family and I were threatened sir Threatened By whom the senator questioned By a terrorist sir Ollie answered Terrorist What terrorist could possibly scare you that much His name is Osama bin Laden sir Ollie replied At this point the senator tried to repeat the name but couldnt pronounce it which most people back then probably couldnt A couple of people laughed at the attempt Then the senator continued Why are you so afraid of this man the senator asked Because sir he is the most evil person alive that I know of Ollie answered And what do you recommend we do about him asked the senator Well sir if it were up to me I would recommend that an assassin team be formed to eliminate him and his men from the face of the earth The senator disagreed with this approach and that was all that was shown of the clip By the way The Senator that was questioning Ollie was named Al Gore Andrea Walters Do You Yahoo Great stuff seeking new owners in Yahoo Auctions
